client_description.Summary Note:
The RM has known Fernández Gil since childhood, as their families have been close friends for many years. This long-standing relationship has fostered a deep trust and understanding between them.
Fernández Gil is a 23 year old and comes from Italy.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in his decision to join.
client_description.Family Background: Fernández Gil is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description.Education Background:
Fernández graduated from IES Federico García Lorca Granada in 2019.
Fernández completed his university education at IE University in 2024.

Fernández Gil is a 23 year old and comes from Italy.

client_description.Wealth Summary:
He did not manage to save any money during his career.
Client does not have any properties.He inherited a significant sum of 2080000 EUR from his grandfather, a respected Tech Entrepreneur, in 2015, which he has wisely invested.
client_description.Client Summary: The RM is looking forward to supporting the client in building a successful career and achieving financial stability.
